work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Describe work, special projects, notable achievements, what technologies you have been working with, and anything else that would be useful for an employer to know.

work.title: System Engineer
work.description: Maintain ETL pipelines by Airflow that would do the daily sync millions of records from/to different types of dataset.

work.title: Algorithm Development Engineer
work.description: Implement advanced object detection and image classification algorithms, collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet customer needs, develop solid web backends for seamless AI integration, and continue to follow AI integration and web development trends to enhance solutions.

work.title: Software Engineer intern
work.description: Conducted thorough research on machine learning techniques, exploring and implementing cutting-edge models.
